name: couchdb-migrator
description: Utility belt for creating, resetting and seeding couchdb databases
readme:
Looks for a file named database.json in a config directory in the root which contains connection information:

{
    "host": "https://casamiento.iriscouch.com",
    "port": "443",
    "username": "casamiento",
    "password": "floppsy1"
}
